  • Method Details

    • insert

      public boolean insert​(E item)

    • insert

      private boolean insert​(BTree.Node<E> root, E item)
      Recursively insert an item into the B-tree. Inserted item must implement the Comparable interface
      Parameters:
      root - The local root
      item - The item to be inserted
      Returns:
      true if the item was inserted, false if the item is already in the tree

    • splitNode

      private void splitNode​(BTree.Node<E> node, int index, E item, BTree.Node<E> child)

    • insertIntoNode

      private void insertIntoNode​(BTree.Node<E> node, int index, E obj, BTree.Node<E> child)
      Method to insert a new value into a node
      Parameters:
      node - The node to insert the value into
      index - The index where the inserted item is to be placed
      child - The right child of the value to be inserted
